import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Sidenav from '../components/Sidenav' import { Link } from "react-bootstrap"; function ParticularData({ match }) { const [info, setInfo] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchInfo = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/info/${match.params.id}`) setInfo(data) } fetchInfo() }, [match]) return ( <>

{info.end_year}

{info.intensity}

{info.sector}

{info.topic}

{info.insight}

{info.url}

{info.region}

{info.start_year}

{info.impact}

{info.added}

{info.published}

{info.country}

{info.relevance}

{info.pestle}

{info.source}

{info.title}

{info.likelihood}

) } export default ParticularData
